subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Just as it has found its swagger, the Giants’ defense is limping again. LaVar Arrington will miss the rest of the season because of a torn Achilles’ tendon and Osi Umenyiora will miss at least Sunday’s game.
snippet: Just as it has found its swagger, the Giants’ defense is limping again. LaVar Arrington will miss the rest of the season because of a torn Achilles’ tendon and Osi Umenyiora will miss at least Sunday’s game.
